text: Tā chuàngzào nǐmen [rú ā dān], xiān yòng nítǔ, ránhòu yòng yīdī jīngyè [rú chuàngzào ā dān de hòuyì], ránhòu yòng yīkuài níngxiě [zhù], ránhòu shǐ nǐmen chūshēng wèi yīng'ér, ránhòu shǐ nǐmen zhǎng dào chéngnián, ránhòu shǐ nǐmen biàn chéng lǎorén, jǐnguǎn yǐqián nǐmen zhōng yǒu yāozhé de, yǐbiàn nǐmen huó dào yīgè dìngqí, yǐbiàn nǐmen mínglǐ.
